result.execSummary:
The defendant Veronica Rae Fitzgerald was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Misdemeanor Theft [Modifiers: Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: In the event that the defendant is discharged from probation with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent SHALL notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment SHALL be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes: Restitution Ordered:  $200.00 - S.B.; $20.00 - surcharge.  Bond money from Tremp. Co Case Nos. 15 CM 35 and 15 CM 36 is to be applied.
Defendant is to pay court costs.  Bond money from Tremp. Co. Case No. 15 CM 36 is to be applied.
Defendant is to perform any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent.

timeConds.notes: STAYED if Defendant performs 40 hours of community service within the 1st 6 months of probation.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

William Nemer appears for the State.  Atty Sebion appears for the Defendant.  Defendant appears in person.  Offer rec'd.  Set for Pleas.

Pre-trial conference at 04-20-2015 10:00 am.
Status Conference at 05-07-2015 01:30 pm.

Taavi McMahon appears for the State.  Defendant appears in person and w/out counsel. 1:00 defendant does not appear.  Warrant - granted.  2:00 defendant appears and court cancel warrant.  Court explains rights to def and def understands.  Defendant enters NG plea.  PTC and STC set.  Bond cont.
Bond posted at Tremp. Co. Jail.  No need for written cancellation.
from Ms. Fitzgerald.  She did not get NOH for today's hrgs.  She is living in a homeless shelter.  She was told a warrant would be issued and that she may surrender herself.
Defendant Veronica Rae Fitzgerald not in court.  Taavi Mc Mahon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Warrant and forfeiture of any bond.
